channel.title: Is it possible to run discord from Whonix?
channel.description: The title says it all. I'd like to know if one could run discord from Whonix workstation and hear sound. Or discord uses UDP for it, so it doesn't work?

item.title: Is it possible to run discord from Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I don’t know discord but maybe no need for wine / mono? First search result discord linux.

https://linuxconfig.org/how-to-install-discord-on-linux

Does this help?

Whonix

Tunnel UDP over Tor

Workaround for Tunnelling UDP over Tor. Connection Schema: user -> Tor -> destination

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to run discord from Whonix?

item.title: Is it possible to run discord from Whonix?
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
u need to make it work with wine or mono first , then check if it will accept Tor connections or not. though if its only UDP then it will not gonna work because Tor only using TCP connection.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to run discord from Whonix?
